ygData.subject: Fw: [sg-everquest] Re: new money making method near Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: The lan shop is located in Tiong Bahru Plaza on the 3rd floor. Quite close to the food court. Hanen Bladedancer ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
The lan shop is located in Tiong Bahru Plaza on the 3rd floor. Quite close
to the food court.

Hanen Bladedancer

----- Original Message -----
From: <kelvin_77@...>
To: <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2001 12:26 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Re: new money making method near Freeport


> hehe,
> I think I will be good friend with the pet :)
> by the way what lan shop is that u were talking about?
> where? most lan shop here play CS but i am so sick of it.
> use to play it in camp:) hahahah
> may be i will consider switching server.
> most people in karana are french. merci
> blah blah blah they talk to you and u will not understand.Lol
> and the time for most guild active is our time 3am!
> thanks for the kind offer. May be i can even show you the butt
> dance i learn from karana. very funny dance to dance around
> the corpse when u level.
>
>
>
> --- In sg-everquest@e..., K W Lee <kw.lee@h...> wrote:
> > Yeah, the boss of the LAN shop is guild member, so members got
> their
> > previlidges ;P Somemore sometime got jude female guild members who
> visite
> > the shop and chat with u ;P
> >
> > Innoruuk AdV is going pretty strong....can send me a tell also if u
> are
> > coming to Innoruuk. May not be able to give u very solid loots but
> > definitely can give u stuffs better than u yaself farm it b4 lvl
> 20 ;) Err
> > this only saying for myself coz I'm kinda dry after helping a few
> sg
> > players and few UO guild members (Baja shard, The Dark Wardens) who
> come
> > over to EQ; I guess others got much better stuffs to offer ;)
> >
> >
> > Ziltus Planeswalker (AdV) Innoruuk, de Ass Zapper
> >
> > p/s1: Ah, how I missed this kinda of earn-money msg 2 yrs ago....
> > p/s2: If u come to Inno, pls dun use the name frostburn anymore,
> coz we got
> > a pet bear in guild also named Frostburn, heh.
> >
> > On 17 March, 2001 10:49 AM, Matthew Tan [SMTP:leshrec@m...] wrote:
> > > I do not know about the other servers, but we are still going
> strong on
> > the
> > > Innoruuk server (Avanguardia). Anyways, I encourage that you
> switch
> > servers
> > > to one of the other servers Kaen mentioned since theres a larger
> > singaporean
> > > player base there. Just send a tell to Leshrec if you need help
> or
> > anything
> > > if you ever come to the Innoruuk server.
> > >
> > > P.S. Theres are quite a few people in Silvermoon lan shop (Tiong
> Bahru
> > > plaza) who plays everquest in our guild so feel free to drop in
> and meet
> > > some of our members ;)
> > >
> > > Leshrec Kalesk'Thor
> > > Sorcerer aka HEY CABBY!
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Kaen <chaotic@p...>
> > > To: <sg-everquest@y...>
> > > Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 3:44 AM
> > > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] new money making method near Freeport
> > >
> > >
> > > > No Offence Kelvin but most of us here are lvl 50+ players
> > > > and very bored people (most of which have NO life whatsoever) .
> > > >
> > > > If u want to find a server with lots of Singaporeans
> > > > head down to Erollisi Marr , Lanys T''vyl or Innoruuk
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Kaen
> > > > Erollisi Marr
> > > >
> > > > At 08:42 PM 3/16/2001, you wrote:
> > > > >For those who are near freeport,
> > > > >go to desert of ro through freeport.
> > > > >there is an inn very near to the zone area that sells
> > > > >large sewing kit.
> > > > >
> > > > >most of the other places selling this are far away
> > > > >I have heard from other boards that each of this can sell 5pp-
> 10pp
> > > > >most people are lazy to find it or too low level to travel far.
> > > > >
> > > > >I am trying it at my server i hope this work :P
> > > > >cheers
> > > > >
> > > > >happy questing
